facts.text: Appeal from judgment and order dated November 25, 1958, of the Punjab High Court in F.A.O. No. 173 of 1958.

anchor.surface_text: against the judgment and order dated November 25, 1958, of that Court, dismissing an appeal against the order of the Election Tribunal, Hissar, dated September 14, 1958,

facts.text: Election Tribunal set aside appellant's election to Punjab Legislative Assembly.

anchor.surface_text: setting aside the appellants election to the Punjab Legislative Assembly.

facts.text: Appellant was successful candidate from general seat in double-member constituency of Sirsa.

facts.text: Respondent No. 2 was successful Harijan candidate from Sirsa constituency.

anchor.surface_text: The first respondent contested the general seat.

facts.text: Sixteen candidates left after withdrawals: eight for general, eight for reserved seat.
